thread.title: 'Vulture' advisers ripped off UK steelworkers - report

title: 'Vulture' advisers ripped off UK steelworkers - report
text:
'Vulture' advisers ripped off UK steelworkers - report 4:11pm IST - 01:42 
Britain's markets watchdog was too slow to prevent ''vulture'' financial advisers from ripping off steelworkers faced with critical decisions over their 14 billion pound ($19.4 billion) pension pot, lawmakers said in a report on Thursday.   
Britain's markets watchdog was too slow to prevent "vulture" financial advisers from ripping off steelworkers faced with critical decisions over their 14 billion pound ($19.4 billion) pension pot, lawmakers said in a report on Thursday.  //reut.rs/2svfhAp
